website_summaries.verdict: A classic ant farm with a large viewing area great for children and the classroom.
pros: This “giant” version offers more viewing than the original version while still being manageable in size
This “old school” ant farm appeals to nostalgic adults
cons: Costly and takes a long time to order them from the company

customer_reviews.title: Ants pushed out side tabs
customer_reviews.text: Within 24 hours of setting this habitat up, the ants worked together as a team, pushed out the tabs on the sides and escaped. Gotta give 5 stars to the ants and 1 star to this product for not considering this. Maybe I got some super smart and strong ants?
customer_reviews.author: JetRocket11

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several ant farms in the last ten years and have always had great luck. This is the first time I purchased this particular one and I was so very disappointed. I will say that I loved the look and style of the ant farm. However, after 24 hours all but 1 ant was dead. The ants did not do any tunneling. I am not sure how tunneling in sand is even possible. Every time they would try to tunnel the hole would fill up immediately with more sand. It was especially disappointing since this was for my 4 year olds bday present. Stick with the blue gel ant farm!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Angela

customer_reviews.title: None have escaped!
customer_reviews.text: No ants have escaped! Although, you should not put small ants in it, because they will escape. The type of ants you get from this company (which you have to send in for) are the perfect size. Our first shipment of ants froze because my husband didn't bring the mail inand it was 28 F outside. We just got a refill package (50 ants) and they are doing well.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBird

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This ant farm is awesome. It’s huge and comes with detailed instructions on how to keep the farm in good health. I think my wife and I love it more than the kids. We can spend hours looking at this creatures working constantly building tunnels. We research the ins and outs and have been successful keeping them alive. I waited several weeks to post the review to make sure they were not dying right away. I found a great and inexpensive ant distributor online. Definitely worth the price we paid for this farm. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Babilonia

customer_reviews.title: Not legal in Oregon!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my ant farm as a kid and wanted to share the experience with my granddaughters. So I bought it, then discovered too late that ants can’t be shipped to Oregon. Seriously?? I’ll try to find ants on my own but it’s the rainy season, to be followed by freezing rain. Arg!
customer_reviews.author: Mousecard

customer_reviews.title: Covid19 entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Covid-19 lock-down entertainment. The fun started with awaiting the amazon truck and notification it was delivered. Then we got another farm bc we were such bored nerds and literally watched them for hours. Much better than the gel. We started with gel and the ants must’ve been in a union bc they sucked. Did no physical labor. Literally just hung out on the top of the gel. Old time fun!
customer_reviews.author: That nerd over here

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item was suppose to be my granddaughters birthday present. When she opened the box at her party, a bag of white stuff was open & all over the place. There is no instructions on how to care for the ants. No code on how to receive the ants & no tube to grow the ant farm with. Its a total mess.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected and has served the purpose, kids enjoy seeing the tunnels and observing ant behavior. Great for our science discussion and observation. However, I wish the plastic windows were clearer. We get the best clarity when we take the top off and watch our ants from above, we can see them so clearly and unobstructed. I wish the plastic windows were clearer, but maybe that's not possible. I wish I had bought a magnifying glass to go with it, that would be a nice addition. I ordered a double tube of ants, but they arrived with 1 tube totally alive and the 2nd tube right next to it entirely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ant farm! It comes with a code to order the ants separately. This makes sense as they're live creatures. The code gives you two vials of ants and then you have to pay $6 in shipping. They said it would be 2-3 weeks but we received ours in less than two weeks. Set up was easy and it is a nice size. The only thing I would change is the weird picture attached. It blocks viewing the back side. The farm is wide enough for the ants to make tunnels on both sides and of course they've been more active on the blocked side. All in all, it is pretty close to perfect!
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. They went out and found their own ants in the backyard and they are surviving and building tunnels. It came with sand and a tube to connect a second antfarm, which really neat. It is made from cheap plastic but it gets the job done and is easy for kids. It comes with a certificate for ants, but you have to mail away for them so we just found our own.
customer_reviews.author: LcharapichTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Can't buy ants for this useless item.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three or four Uncle Milton's ant farms over the years and each and EVERY time there were problems trying to get the ants. This time I got online to put in my order for the ants and NOWHERE could I find the place to take my debit/credit card info. When I called the woman there couldn't take a phone order, couldn't take a check, had no suggestions. Basically they're happy on their end. They got your money so end of story. Buy a hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Lin L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy but one bag of sand was open and all over the inside of the box. So only had one bag of usable sand. Also the ant guid was not included.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Quiet time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She sat there for awhile amazed by how well ants work together. She got excited when it was time to feed and water them and handled her responsibilities well at 6 years old. The ants come separately after you order them on the website that they recommend (you already paid for them in this package deal). We waited two weeks, and all were alive, none ever escaped. We made sure we heard everything snap closed. They are very big ants, easy to see. The only disappointment is nature, ants only live a month or so... You can always order another vial of 30 more ants.
customer_reviews.author: Yaffa

customer_reviews.title: Great ant farm but....
customer_reviews.text: My kids were ecstatic when this ant farm arrived. We instantly opened it up and prepared for our ant hunt. We went and found a small colony of carpenter ants and put them in. When we got back I looked for the code to order ants in case these ones didn’t tunnel and realized everything guide book with the code was nowhere to be found. This is why I only gave this product four stars. I can’t return it since we already put some ants i it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We received the ant farm and sent off for our free ants from the company. The ants arrived in about two weeks. There were close to 30 ants alive in the two tubes. We followed directions to a T, and by day two, we were down a third of the ants. By day 4, we had 12. It’s day 7 and all are dead. Kids super disappointed. We basically watched them make tunnels for two days and then spend their entire time burying the dead ones. We emailed the company and have yet to receive a response.
customer_reviews.author: RPG

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 bag of sand (states 2), no coupon for ordering ants and no poster. Basically 1/2 the kit is missing
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Hahn

customer_reviews.title: ant escape
customer_reviews.text: It's my forst review on Amazon but I have to say that ants are escaping from this farm kit. I have to put tape everywhere. Not really happy with this product when I found ants on my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Lori  Gorton

customer_reviews.title: This new giant one is fantastic. The graphics on the farm are great as ...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had the smaller gel type ant farms. This new giant one is fantastic. The graphics on the farm are great as well. The kids and us adults looked forward every day to see their progress!
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Ants can and will escape!!
customer_reviews.text: Ants escape through poorly designed side holes that are plugged but available for connection of multiple ant farms. The plugs are not “locked” the ants can and did just push open one of the plugs and there were large ants all over kitchen counter and floor. Ant farm is not very secure. I would worry that a kid would knock it over and it would let the ants out aside from the plugs issue above, which I was very surprised they just push out so easily. Very cool otherwise, we had been enjoying seeing the ants dig their tunnels and eat their grape slices. Handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Tracy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandkids/kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Grandson loved this ant farm. Packaged well, easy to follow instructions and bargain priced. The only negative is that the ants only live about 6 weeks. But they are cheap and I just reordered another 30 for only $6.99. Overall it’s a great present. My grandson was so excited the morning after we put the ants in only to discover numerous tunnels everywhere. Quite fascinating and educational.
customer_reviews.author: ralph white

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Made me push at least one star but I give it 0 stars!! They were supposed to send the ants separately but never did. Bought 7/14...no anys as of 9/11. Pointless without the large ants that are supposed to be included. Pure junk! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: eh, is it me or the farm
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 ant farms, one for each kid, followed how to do everything and even watched videos just to be sure, the ants are barley digging tunnels and die after a few days in both farms, maybe im just doing it wrong but its been a huge fail with these ant farms
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be what was advertised and shown. The sand and all was there but the ants have not really made it a home. I was under the impression there would be a certificate for ants or a coupon for ants included--there was none. Ordered ants at a reasonable price then paid a hefty price for "shipping and handling". Not a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Young

customer_reviews.title: Never received ant vouchers
customer_reviews.text: Cant really say how well this item is bc I never received the ant vouchers with my purchase... and I cant see paying 20 dollars for 50 ants plus what we already paid for the habitat.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but ants died quickly
customer_reviews.text: We received our ants pretty quickly - about 3 weeks after ordering them. When they arrived they appeared healthy and they quickly began making tunnels. However by day 4 every ant had died. We hadn't had time to mess anything up that I know of. We had followed the instructions. They were a lot of fun to watch while it lasted. Maybe we'll try again one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: Engraver's Nest

customer_reviews.title: Ants dead in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: The farm came with the voucher for ants, and sand. Following instructions, we poured enough water into the sand to be damp, and we put a couple slices of cherry in there. Our ants came an i would say about half were dead. We are at a week and a half of having these ants and are down to two live ones. You feed once a week, which means we followed instructions. My kid is heartbroken and doesn't understand why I won't buy her more ants..
customer_reviews.author: Hannah S

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this one first!
customer_reviews.text: Originally we bought a gel ant farm. The ants were dying. So after a month, we bought this one and transferred the ants that were still alive. As you can see, they're doing wonderful! The shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: B. HESTER

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome gift for my son. We had a lot of fun watching the ants dig tunnels and how they live. Easy to put together. Most of the ants died off and we then let the rest go outside. Not sure what we did wrong but it was fascinating to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: So fun to watch!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this ant farm! We had one a few years ago & enjoyed it just as much then. Every member of our family enjoys watching them! I did ‘seal’ the sides with duct tape because of reviews saying the ants pushed the plugs out, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons, 3 and 6 years old. They love watching the ants everyday. We ordered two packages of ants. Sometimes we are having to move the ants off the table because the boys forget to eat. They are really a lot of fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBob

customer_reviews.title: Possible great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: The actual farm is good. The ants keep dying. They replace them and those died also. I think a weather warning is needed or ship them next day mail so you know when to expect them so they aren’t sitting in the mailbox
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating to watch them build their sand tunnels!
customer_reviews.text: We have been fascinated by this. Ordered ants sep on amazon for $8 + 7 shipping which was annoying. 1/3 came dead but easy to transfer. My 10yo keeps checking on them. Its cool to watch the GIRL ANTS (yes, bc thats what they are!) built their tunnels. Ingenious creatures!!! Kinda relaxing to watch.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: For the first week it was super cool and exciting to watch the ants do their thing, but then the food becomes moldy and very hard to get it out so we left it there so it was very unattractive. A lot of ants died in a month but about 5 held on for about 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stonesie

customer_reviews.title: Frustration, cuz we need more of that.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this any farm for my 7 year old cousin so she would stop putting random bugs in containers not appropriate for them. Why in the world do we have to order the ants separate? And I live in Michigan, so "the right temperature" doesn't work with the wide fluctuation here.... So it's put together in the box just sitting next to door wasted money. Don't get this unless you know all the details and live somewhere you know they will send the ants.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning opportunity
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 4yo daughter and she loves it! Honestly the whole family enjoys watching the ants work. It took a while for the ants to arrive so you might consider ordering them first a couple weeks ahead of the farm.
customer_reviews.author: hillary attar

customer_reviews.title: This is oddly so entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how much fun this would be! My kid is obsessed and I find myself checking their progress all the time too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for observing ants but a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome for my preschool class. They love observing the ants (which I bought separately). My only complaint with this habitat is that it is a bit unsteady and can be knocked over easily. A bigger more stout base would solve that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remember you have to buy the ants.
customer_reviews.text: This was plastic and you have to buy the ants for 7-8 bucks and they were all dead within the first week. Not liking that I boxed it back up and maybe will try again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Z.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am a preschool teacher and this was an amazing tool to teach my kids about ants. They absolutely loved watching the ants make tunnels and how everyday was a new surprise of tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Landavazo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This was not great Ants are not included and to get them you have to pay extra and wait 5 weeks or more, and if you try to use ant around your house they die within hours...don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Amalan

customer_reviews.title: Teamwork!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for preschool class ... we had such fun watching the teamwork and tunnels. Had a little difficulty getting the ants 🐜 and wish more had lived but even the teamwork to bury them was interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Pegi Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Product quality did not live up to our expectations. My 7 year old burst into tears upon arrival when ant farm was far different from what she expected.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can get ants through the mail in your state.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited to order the ant farm and he called me every day to see if his ants had come yet. Several days later I received an email that said ants could not be sent through the mail to Oregon' He was so disappointed. The email recommended that he find ants locally to use. I,m sure he will do this but part of the fun was getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea bad implementation
customer_reviews.text: not sure if i got a bad one, the top cover doesn't seals the box, i got 3 big ants crawling out of it so not really good to have it inside home.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Interesting gift. Ants are easily seen. Instructions for care are not very helpful and rather light on specifics. Would not buy again, but my son enjoyed watching the ants.
customer_reviews.author: Scarabman

customer_reviews.title: Great little ant farm!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a project to keep the kids busy during the late summer! Great gift set, comes with everything but the ants !
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Solie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good container for ant colony. Although it doesn't come with an ant colony. The "sand" it came with seemed very artificial.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Great....for a month
customer_reviews.text: When you buy the ants... expect them to die in 1 month. This is not against the container. but rather, the fun aspect of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: StarSilver

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Already assembled and well made! Packaging is fantastic and my 4 year old will be thrilled! Ants do take 2-5 weeks to ship if weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. It was neat to watch the ants work. The ants did not live long for us- but that could have been our fault; we may have added too much water. Overall, it was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Skowneski

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids love it. My wife cabt stop watching them either. We could all watch them for hours working and playing they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment for hours
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 4 y.o & ended up being a gift both my 13 y.o & 4 y.o enjoy & bond over! Hours of outdoor & indoor fun
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves looking at the ants build ! Great product and lots of fun ! Great quality and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the giant ant farm by Uncle Milton! The instructions were very clear. They even included a coupon for a free ants(just pay shipping) and most ants arrived alive! Just follow the instructions and you will have a great ant farm that your child will love. Our ants got working right away building tunnels within hours. This photo is after 5 days of ant work.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, entertaining and educational!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids liked this. I ordered live ants for it and they were fast workers. It is sturdy and big enough for multiple kids to look at together.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Rae

customer_reviews.title: The ants take months to arrive.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and directions make sense.However my granddaughter has been waiting for her ants to arrive for over a month and could be several more.Iv wrote company and it seems getting ants is not an easy or fast thing so if ordering for birthday or xmas you may want to order 6 months early so you actually can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jurek

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: When pouring your ants in I suggest you dump your ants in through the top and not use the side tunnel because the sand will cover the hole, or the ants don't climb in. Also, you must wet the sand first or the ants can't make tunnels. Besides that it's an awesome ant farm.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Ant Farm
customer_reviews.text: Ants died other than that it was just as ordered. Would not recommend this particular ant farm.
customer_reviews.author: Theron Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Got 11 great grandkids these for Christmas. They always want to play with my "grabber" so got them these. Hope the parents aren't having to take them away!! Their problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great “biology” gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect gift that boosts interests in biology for kids. I just wished that the lid could slide a bit further so that the entrance hole is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for Christmas and he loves it. He loves bugs an animals and the habitat is still going strong after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew D.

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons LOVED this! They checked it all the time and would tell me what new tunnels and hills the ants were making.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Live Ants Not Included
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased ant farms before and they always came with the live ants. Now I have to order ants and wait another 4-5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: kfirst

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order ants instead of ones from yard?
customer_reviews.text: I put black ants in & they only lived 4 days. Gave them water & Cheerios crumbs. I put red ants yesterday, added water, gave them Cheerios crumbs & they r going to sleep. Hopefully they live for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ant farm for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: 24 hrs after setup ants are still busy working and no escape! Perfect size and great value. Both my 6 year old and 3 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Kid
customer_reviews.text: I had these when I was a kid and my daughter now has one. They are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bowslayer

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive a voucher for the ants. Any idea how to get help with that?
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cute little background that comes with the farm. Instructions are clear and easy. Code on directions for ordering ants from the company website.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Uncle Milton’s farms/habitats. Easy to manage and great educational toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where does the ant go?
customer_reviews.text: I have taped up every little opening and somehow the ants just escape.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Very cool gift for a big lover!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and is a complete hit for the 4 yr old. Only issure is they were out of the free ants so the family had to purchase the upgraded ones. They did arrive fast though!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Everything as described. Mind that no ants included with the item. Bought a couple and connected the two with the tubes, that are included in the package. I have an impression that the farm has poor cooling system. Water that sunk in the sand never evaporates as it is just stuck there. I believe ants have to experience unpleasant stuffy environment.
customer_reviews.author: Darkhan Lukpanov

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Just missing the stem poster
customer_reviews.text: No complaints and very entertaining for my kids. However, I wanted to ask if I can be sent the stem poster that was supposed to be in the box? It wasn't in there when we opened it. We would enjoy having it to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tank is too small, but we have a solution
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a starter set and found that it was too small. Eventually we filled the living room with sand so that the little guys wouldn’t feel so confined in their ant farm. They seem to being doing much better! However, I’m not sure this is sustainable for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and educational!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and entertaining! The ants were tunneling within an hour or so of arriving in the mail. They are very active and this has exceeded our expectations. Our 5 year old daughter LOVES insects and this is so much fun for her.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Everly

customer_reviews.title: Poor Experience
customer_reviews.text: Ants died on way to us. Ordered replacements that didn't dig and died. Poor experience.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Geiss

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble to get the ants!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the paper with the code to get the free ants. The company is giving me such a hard time to get the ants. I am so disappointed, I will never order from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the ants
customer_reviews.text: The ant farm was easy to assemble and you received what you ordered. I would not order it again because of the ants they sent for the farm. They are fire ants and leave painful bites when they get on your skin. We had some ants escape and it was a mess. It looked like the farm was closed correctly but the ants got out anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ants died within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Ants died within 2 weeks. Emails sent to company were never answered.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great! Fun to watch!
customer_reviews.text: This would make a great gift! Very entertaining & fun to watch!
customer_reviews.author: farrah peeler

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome but you do have to pay $6 shipping for the ants.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: First it was challenging to pick ants from outside. And they didn’t really survive..
customer_reviews.author: Min C.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but the company wants you to buy ants! Not sure if we are keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great educational toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned 6. This was very easy to set up and we went in the yard and found ants right away. He has not set the ant farm down unless to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: nancy baird

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved it. Ages 3-6. I also bought a ant book online to read and educate them. They loved them
customer_reviews.author: Deseree

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: We loved watching these little guys. Easy to set up. They only lived for a month, but we plan to clean out and start over!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and they loved it. Both child and parents thought it was pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great starter ant farm
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for our grandchildren and it’s perfect for a starter ant farm....easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Kellie cronin

customer_reviews.title: Water the sand first!! Then it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had ants for less than 24 hours but look what all they’ve done! They are fascinating to watch. I got this for my little boys, but little did I know it would give me a new appreciation for ants. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jules G.

customer_reviews.title: One tube of ants came dead. The second tube of ants died in 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy. I bought this for my grandson's birthday. One tube of ants came dead. The 2nd tube all the ants died in a week. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 5 year old granddaughter, she loves it. It’s fun to see the ants working.
customer_reviews.author: Chris60

customer_reviews.title: Ants arrived DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Farm seems ok...but when I ordered my ants...not one was alive upon their arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Tacomab2

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: We waited weeks for the ants and they didn’t survive very long.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Pandi

customer_reviews.title: The air holes are to big
customer_reviews.text: The air holes are to big up top and the ants keep coming out so i had to adjust it and make the holes smaller and added a little more holes just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kuys Corporation

customer_reviews.title: Stinging aggressive ants!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT FOR CHILDREN!!! The ants are aggressive and sting! Worse than a bee sting! The ants escaped our farm and I got stung when trying to put them back in. Just glad it wasn’t my children because my finger swelled and got hot and red for several hours!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Ants died
customer_reviews.text: Ants dint last long they were trying to get out no nest were made or tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know how to care for ants properly.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the ant farm. Although she put too much food for the ants in there. She had put apples and cake in it. The ants died. So we are going to try again. But the product was easy to assemble. Held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with no ants
customer_reviews.text: The empty farm arrived with a note saying the ants would come a couple weeks later. It has been more than a month and still no ants. Turns out a waste of money sadly and not like what I remember from having something similar growing up. Too bad, my son is super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old loves it - really interesting to watch - easy care
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Watts

customer_reviews.title: What little busy guys
customer_reviews.text: I just loved my ant farm! I had several growing up! Some people think im nuts, but once they watch they agree with me. So entertaining to watch the busy little guys never stop. when they do their friends will bury them! Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Terri Wischer

product_meta.title: Uncle Milton Giant Ant Farm - Large Viewing Area - Care for Live Ants - Nature Learning Toy - Science DIY Toy Kit - Great Gift for Boys & Girls
product_meta.description: Size:Original versionNow kids can take an even bigger look at the amazing underground world of ants. The re-designed Giant Ant Farm now matches the sleek look and quality of the 60th ANT-iversary versions introduced last year but now with twice the viewing area. It also features a whimsical ant town picnic scene. The included tubes and antports also allow you to connect this to other ant farms including the original size and is a perfect centerpiece for your Ant Farm collection. The large viewing area also makes it great for classrooms too! Order live harvester ants online! * *Postage and handling fee required. Ants shipped only within continental limits of USA
feature_bullets: OBSERVE LIVE ANTS: Dig tunnels, build bridges, move mountains, and so much more!
STEM learning toy allows children ages 6 and up to discover the amazing behavior and anatomy of ants.
BREAK RESISTANT AND ESCAPE PROOF: A self-locking device that makes it escape-proof and provides easy access for feeding and giving water to the ants.
CONNECTING ANTPORTS: Use the included ant way connector tube to link multiple habitats together, creating an even larger ant community.
ANT WATCHERS GUIDE: STEM learning guide is included to teach you about the fascinating creatures that you’ll be observing.
VOUCHER INCLUDED: Your set includes an online code voucher for free ants! You’ll just pay a small shipping & handling fee

specifications.Included Components: 1 Starter stick, 1 Instruction, 2 Bags of sand, 1 Giant Ant Farm
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars731 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
